segment.source: This section of the Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) Administrator’s Guide includes information about the various types of Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring administration and operating tasks that are typically performed by an administrator.
segment.target: This section of the Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) Administrator’s Guide includes information about the various types of Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring administration and operating tasks that are typically performed by an administrator.

segment.source: This section also includes step-by-step procedures to help you successfully perform those tasks.
segment.target: This section also includes step-by-step procedures to help you successfully perform those tasks.

segment.source: If you want to install MBAM to work with Configuration Manager 2007 or Microsoft System Center 2012 Configuration Manager, refer to this section for information about architecture, planning, deployment, and reporting.
segment.target: If you want to install MBAM to work with Configuration Manager 2007 or Microsoft System Center 2012 Configuration Manager, refer to this section for information about architecture, planning, deployment, and reporting.

segment.source: After completing all necessary planning and then deploying MBAM, you can configure and use it to manage enterprise BitLocker encryption.
segment.target: After completing all necessary planning and then deploying MBAM, you can configure and use it to manage enterprise BitLocker encryption.

segment.source: The information in this section describes post-installation day-to-day MBAM feature operations and maintenance tasks.
segment.target: The information in this section describes post-installation day-to-day MBAM feature operations and maintenance tasks.

segment.source: Monitoring and Reporting BitLocker Compliance with MBAM 2.0
segment.target: Monitoring and Reporting BitLocker Compliance with MBAM 2.0

segment.source: This section describes how to generate and understand the different MBAM reports to monitor BitLocker usage and compliance activities throughout your enterprise environment.
segment.target: This section describes how to generate and understand the different MBAM reports to monitor BitLocker usage and compliance activities throughout your enterprise environment.

segment.source: This section describes post-installation day-to-day BitLocker encryption management tasks that are accomplished by using MBAM.
segment.target: This section describes post-installation day-to-day BitLocker encryption management tasks that are accomplished by using MBAM.

segment.source: This section describes how to configure MBAM to run in a highly available fashion while using it to manage enterprise BitLocker encryption operations.
segment.target: This section describes how to configure MBAM to run in a highly available fashion while using it to manage enterprise BitLocker encryption operations.

segment.source: The information in this section describes high availability options for MBAM as well as how to move MBAM Server features if necessary.
segment.target: The information in this section describes high availability options for MBAM as well as how to move MBAM Server features if necessary.

segment.source: This section describes an overview of MBAM security considerations and explains many of the data collection and use practices of MBAM.
segment.target: This section describes an overview of MBAM security considerations and explains many of the data collection and use practices of MBAM.

segment.source: This section describes the set of Windows PowerShell cmdlets available for administrators performing various MBAM Server tasks from the command line rather than from the Administration and Monitoring website.
segment.target: This section describes the set of Windows PowerShell cmdlets available for administrators performing various MBAM Server tasks from the command line rather than from the Administration and Monitoring website.

segment.source: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring 2 Administrator's Guide
segment.target: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring 2 Administrator's Guide
